lyrics.text: Lesson 75. S.O.S. First listen and then answer the question. How did the woman get help?
lyrics.translation: 第75课。S.O.S. 首先听录音，然后回答问题。这位女士是如何获得帮助的？

lyrics.text: When a light passenger plane flew off course some time ago, it crashed in the mountains
lyrics.translation: 当一架轻型客机在不久前偏离了航线时，它在山区坠毁了。

lyrics.text: and its pilot was killed. The only passengers, a young woman and her two baby daughters,
lyrics.translation: 而飞行员遇难了。唯一的乘客，一位年轻妇女和她的两个婴儿女儿，

lyrics.text: were unhurt. It was the middle of winter. Snow lay thick on the ground. The woman knew
lyrics.translation: 没有受伤。那时正值隆冬，地面上覆盖着厚厚的积雪。那个女人知道

lyrics.text: that the nearest village was miles away. When it grew dark, she turned a suitcase into a
lyrics.translation: 最近的村庄在数英里之外。天色渐暗时，她把一个手提箱变成了

lyrics.text: bed and put the children inside it, covering them with all the clothes she could find.
lyrics.translation: 她把孩子们放到床上，用她能找到的所有衣服盖住他们。

lyrics.text: During the night, it got terribly cold. The woman kept as near as she could to the children
lyrics.translation: 在夜晚，天气变得非常寒冷。这位女士尽可能地靠近孩子们。

lyrics.text: and even tried to get into the case herself, but it was too small. Early next morning,
lyrics.translation: 并且甚至试图自己钻进箱子里，但是箱子太小了。第二天一早，

lyrics.text: she heard planes passing overhead and wondered how she could send a signal. Then she had
lyrics.translation: 她听到头顶上有飞机飞过，想知道自己怎样才能发出信号。然后她有了一个主意。

lyrics.text: an idea. She stamped out the letters S.O.S. in the snow. Fortunately, a pilot saw the
lyrics.translation: 一个想法。她在雪地里踩出了S.O.S.的字母。幸运的是，一个飞行员看到了

lyrics.text: signal and sent a message by radio to the nearest town. It was not long before a helicopter
lyrics.translation: 发出信号并通过无线电向最近的城镇发送消息。不久之后，一架直升机

lyrics.text: arrived on the scene to rescue the survivors of the plane crash.
lyrics.translation: 到达现场去救援飞机失事的幸存者。
